reviews.customers_say: Customers like the sweater's beautiful color and find it super soft. The fabric quality receives mixed feedback.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful in Baby Soft Blue!!
items.body: A very soft well made sweater!! The pattern of this sweater is very eye catching and again when you put it on it’s like wearing a cloud per sey!! Now the saying with this sweater is PRETTY IN BABY BLUE!!!!!!!!!!! Read more
items.author: Heather J Henry

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it
items.body: I loved it, the color and the quality of the fabric are great, and it's super soft. I recommend it for this cold weather. Read more
items.author: briseli

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Going to give it another try
items.body: I love this sweater it is a beautiful color and feel to the fabric. I had to return the one I received and I will be reordering another with high hopes for the quality. The sweater had lines throughout it where the material was not as thick so it was appearing as see through. There were random lines like this on the front and back of the sweater. Read more
items.author: SherryP

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute baby blue sweater
items.body: Super cute sweater! Very soft and looks well made. Read more
items.author: FloridaGulf

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super Soft Sweater
items.body: I picked a size large based on the chart provided but this sweater is extremely stretchy and runs big. The style is perfect for fall and the material is super soft and comfortable. It's not as cropped as it looks. You could probably tuck it slightly if you wanted to into jeans, a skirt, leather pants, etc. Love the light blue color. The pictures are very accurate. The one shoulder feature does not sit awkwardly if you get your right size! This blue sweater and all white or camel brown would be super cute and stylish! Read more
items.author: Heather Jones

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, trendy sweater
items.body: This sweater is so cute and stylish! The color is a true baby blue in person (it looks almost white in my photo because of the lighting). I absolutely love the fit, it’s so flattering and the asymmetrical one shoulder look is super in right now. I wore it with a pair of shorts a few days ago where it was chilly in the morning but warming up as they day went on and it was perfect for that weather and I also received a compliment on it. The knit is very soft against my skin and breathable but substantial enough to keep you warm if a gust of wind hits you. I love the cropped length as shorter tops like this help make us shorties look a bit taller (I’m 5’2” and the sweater hits right at the top part of my hipbone). It also looks really cute with skirts and various styles of pants and the baby blue color makes it easy to find clothes to go with it. The model shows the buttons at the waistband being worn in the front so that’s how I wore it a few days ago, but it doesn’t have a tag at the neck (the tag is on the side seam) so another time I wore it with a skirt and flipped it around so the buttons were at the back and it worked great like that as well. It’s also great quality and I haven’t had any issues washing this sweater (no pilling/fraying, color fading, or buttons coming loose). Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Shawn, Maggi, & our kitties

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful blue, softness like no other!!
items.body: CIDER has done it again (and again)! I am so excited about the sweater. It feels as soft as soft can be and the quality & color are beautiful. I think the cut of the sweater is a little bit on the slim side so it’s not something suitable for my 50yo body frame but will be beautiful on my very fit daughter. She is 5 foot eight, 145 pounds with swimmers shoulders. This is going to be gorgeous on her, the fabric looks and feels expensive and as I’ve come to expect from CIDER clothing, it is well constructed in a thoughtful design. Buy this one and follow this brand! I have multiple pieces and they have all been consistent in quality and construction. Washing well, with a little extra care given. Read more
items.author: Sunshine in the Mountains

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not very comfortable
items.body: Scratchy... but really not my style. The preppy button around the waist doesn't go with the off the shoulder. It feels VERY acrylic... and a bit cheap. It's not super comfy. Read more
items.author: Swimmerchic

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve One Shoulder is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve One Shoulder is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky Blue, White, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
